website_summaries.verdict: This heavy-duty desk lamp offers great value for money with a timeless vintage design.
pros: A simple lamp that features a quality build for the price
Fully adjustable, so you can easily set it to your required angle
Finished in brushed nickel and offers a good light range
cons: Some users report the switch can become defective over time

customer_reviews.title: Great looking lamp, might need to replace switch eventually.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lamp in December of 2017, It worked great until now, November 2018 (11 months). Unfortunately, the on /off switch on top completely stop working. The lamp itself however, still looks great! and repairing is much cheaper than completely replacing it. A trip to Home-Depot and about 30 minutes of labor and it's back to working better than new! changing the switch to a new one is very easy and the repair cost me a total of $3.65.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Pixar Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Best Lamp ever! where do I start Sturdy, Nice Weight has a very nice satin silver finish. It looks and functions like a 100+ dollar lamp from crate and barrel. Seriously if you need a lamp that looks like that Pixar lamp from disney get this one. Priced at 27 bucks it's a no brainer. For those concerned about what bulb to use; I use a Osram LED 40 watt I got at my local Lowes for 4 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Balfour Aucoin

customer_reviews.title: Nice, (too?) tall, heavy duty desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Its a solid, nice looking lamp. I got it to replace the old bankers lamp on my desk. You have to raise it up some to use it as a desk writing type lamp and that makes it almost too tall for my purposes. The cheap on-off twist knob will be the weakest link. I suspect that knob will wear out long before the lamp does. If it fits where you want it, it's a solid, heavy, expensive looking lamp. Very good purchase for the price (under $20).
customer_reviews.author: 007Magnum

customer_reviews.title: ... is a little smaller than I was expecting - perfect for a medium or small desk
customer_reviews.text: This light is a little smaller than I was expecting - perfect for a medium or small desk. It also doesn't articulate quite as much as I would have imagined - but again not a problem - as we are using it as more of a decoration. If you are looking for a very flexible task light - look elsewhere. If you are looking for this "look" - and will likely set the position and forget it - this is really great for the money. We added a Philips Hue light bulb and it fits just fine - does not hang out the end of the lamp shade at all - and casts a nice light.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pellegrini

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Hubby bought this lamp for me to assist in more illumination while sewing. LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this lamp!! ( Sorry if that was a little loud.) Works perfectly. My only consumer warning: when you get this product home, wedge a tiny sliver of cardboard into the joint that holds the lamp stem to the lamp base. It's the perfect and easiest way to stop the stem from wobbling.
customer_reviews.author: Joy to the world

customer_reviews.title: defective switch
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is very functional and well made. Like other swing arm lamps, it puts the light just where you want it, but this one stays in whatever position I choose without having to adjust tension. I use it with a ten watt LED, providing more than adequate light without getting hot. FOLLOW UP. About six weeks after receiving the lamp the switch no longer works
customer_reviews.author: J. Streit

customer_reviews.title: Paperweight?
customer_reviews.text: I found the quality of this lamp very disappointing. The metal is this and the switch does not work properly. It goes out despite having the power on and required a firm bump to turn on again. I'm afraid it might be a fire hazard since there is likely a short or open inside, so mine is a pretty paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Danny B

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Works well, swivels as I expected. The finish is attractive. I like that the bulb is totally covered by the hood. As per other reviews, the switch on top is very hard to turn. I hope mine doesn't break like the others.
customer_reviews.author: BarbaraB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: I think I've had this lamp a year now and it is just wonderful. It's pretty, has great range of movement, and has never gotten anywhere near hot in the long hours I've kept it on unlike what some people had expressed in the reviews when I was first looking to buy it. Perhaps their issue is the bulb they've used? I purchased a nice led bulb in warm white so I didn't have to work under unsightly fluorescent type of lighting when choosing a long term bulb. The bulb I bought can be found on amazon:
customer_reviews.author: gla

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lamp. I'm always a little leery of amazon warehouse deals, wondering if I'll get something that doesn't work, but it was just as stated.. only the packaging was damaged. The lamp was perfect and works fine. The silver shade gives more light than the one I had that broke that had a black shade. Happy camper here, and I saved about $7. :)
customer_reviews.author: thebooklady27

customer_reviews.title: Great value and construction.  Wonderful gift idea for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent lamps. Very nice construction and easy to assemble. Lamp stands approx. 24" tall, and with the adjustable lamp angle, boom arm, and swivel base, adjusts nicely for any use. Just ordered a second lamp for my bedroom stand. Easy to reach from bed and great for reading or using laptop while in bed. I plan to buy a few more for gifts. Affordable and nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: angryamerican

customer_reviews.title: This lamp (x2),  5500K (Daylight), dimmable 40W LED bulbs, and a table top dimmer...  Perfect setup for webcam lighting.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using two of these lamps on my desk, just peeking over the top of my monitor. With two 5500K (Daylight), 40W LED bulbs, I now have ideal light for my Skype conferences and video blogging. With the dimmable LED bulbs, the lamps stay totally cool. I run the power for the lamps through an inexpensive table-top dimmer and outlet expander (cheap!) so I can easily calibrate the output from both lamps at the same time. By using this well-built and good looking lamp, I've saved room, and benefited from the flexibility that a swing-arm lamp provides. For my needs, I don't think I could do any better for a DIY photo lamp solution. I got a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Wiley

customer_reviews.title: the rest of the lamp is great. I bought a LED RGB bulb with this ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it because it reminds me of the Pixar Lamp. The movement does seem a little restricted and the base where the lap lock to the bottom round base is lose and feels cheep. the rest of the lamp is great. I bought a LED RGB bulb with this lamp and it makes my room look great. definitely has a wow factor to it. With this out of the way. its actually a great lamp for studying in the night or when your just burning the midnight oil. would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: It emits light... but that’s about where my praise ends.
customer_reviews.text: Well... at least it turns on. It’s incredibly wobbly, the lamp stand fits into a round hole on the base that is too big for it so it can move around inside. The base is too light to fully support the lamp so you can’t adjust the lamp without holding the base down. The product box arrived torn to shreds And taped back together inside the untouched amazon box so it obviously got used as a football at the amazon warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: She gives it a 5 star for great lighting and practicality
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is a college student and does quiet a bit of studying so she uses this lamp daily. She also uses it when she works on her artwork. She gives it a 5 star for great lighting and practicality.
customer_reviews.author: Living Free Forever

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy strong and looks very modern
customer_reviews.text: This I'd one of the better lamps I've used that allows you to change height and angle. Held pretty firmly on a decent size bulb. Base is solid and less likely to tip over
customer_reviews.author: Phon  Vongdara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quality lamp!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a high quality product! Some of the pictures may portray this lamp looking more like copper, but it is a beautiful brush nickel and well crafted. I absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Calloway

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a grow light for my indoor tomato plant and it's perfect. Quality material and stays in whatever position I put it in. And it's really nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: FUNCTIONS PERFECTLY, STYLISH AND EXPENSIVE LOOKING, EVERYONE SHOULD BUY ONE!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is one of my all time favorite amazon purchases. It looks and functions as well as lamps costing 100.00 or more. Great how you can maneuver it to exactly where you need light...and the screws don't need re-tightening as do those in most flexible lamps. If you forced me to say something negative about this perfect lamp, I mean really forced me--like at gun point--perhaps i'd ask for a larger switch. The small swivel switch hurts my sensitive fingers ever so slightly. But I seriously love this lamp, in spite of it's less than perfect switch.
customer_reviews.author: M. bell

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed with the quality of the construction
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is poorly made. The pivoting arm assembly did not fit 'snugly' into its place intended on the support base leaving the arm assembly to sort of 'flop' from side to side. The was a set screw on the 'female' arm receptacle on the base but it only seemed to be intended to prevent the arm from moving to a position that would make the lamp assembly unstable. The on/off switch is difficult to activate (too stiff). I thought the whole thing looked cheaply made. I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Godec

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lamp. The base is surprisingly heavy which was ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lamp. The base is surprisingly heavy which was exactly what I was hoping for because that ensures the lamp doesn't topple over. The metal finish looks good and high quality and the arms are very stable. My only complain is the light switch that is a bit tricky to turn but I was so relieved that everything else was great that that is a small price to pay. The packaging could be better too, not on Amazon's side but on the manufacturer's side. The lamp wasn't damaged or anything but the box was a little.
customer_reviews.author: Kat M.

customer_reviews.title: Best College Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Best college desk lamp...most colleges prohibit plastic lamps so this one is perfect being all metal. It's great looking and should last as long as my college desk lamp (which I still have from 1986).
customer_reviews.author: F Coss

customer_reviews.title: Shiny but brushed enough to look nice. The base is great- heavy enough to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Shiny but brushed enough to look nice. The base is great- heavy enough to hold lamp as you angle it different ways. I bought this for my drawing table in my art studio and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JANA

customer_reviews.title: A Good Bargain
customer_reviews.text: I've had this unit for a year. A 60-watt bulb creates more light than I xpctd and the lamp is superbly adjustable. Really a good bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Bic Parker

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE MY LAMP.
customer_reviews.text: I love my lamp which now has an 8 Watt (60 watt equivalent) LED bulb. I've got two of them and they provide decent desktop light in two locations. Great for lighting small specific areas.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Nice and classy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Strong and easily adjusted. If you use a LED bulb, it never gets hot. I use mine with a dimmer too. Dimmers don't seem to work to well with LED. Tends to cause them to "strobe" in between high and low. So I use regular bulbs and a dimmer. Works great! Looks like the Pixar lamp!
customer_reviews.author: C Winkler

customer_reviews.title: A very nice and solid desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a solid, heavy base, stainless steel lamp to double as a desk lamp as well as a craft light for working on projects in my garage/shop. This one is great. It is durable, sturdy, and provides a nice light for wiring, soldering, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Versatile lamp, ideal for reading or work light with the right choice of bulb. I have a bright daylight LED fitted, perfect for a variety of tasks. OH has a dimmer off-white LED for bedtime reading. On/off switch looks like a button but in fact rotates one way-could have be a bit better made as it doesn't inspire confidence in the durability of this otherwise perfect lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Gribble 111

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.  Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: For an inexpensive light, it looks pretty nice, switch works fine, good range of adjustability. A little larger than most desk lights. My only complaint is that the swivel in the base is loose, so the lamp can wander from side to side when bumped.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: I put a 60w equivalent LED bulb in it and it's excellent for extra light over my work area
customer_reviews.text: It's pefect for my workbench out in the garage. I put a 60w equivalent LED bulb in it and it's excellent for extra light over my work area. Sturdy base, but you still can't freely articulate it around without tipping over the base. I just clamped it with a small c-clamp to the corner and it's excellent.
customer_reviews.author: T. R.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great lamp! The brushed nickel is lovely
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lamp! The brushed nickel is lovely. It is firm, stable and heavier than I thought. Very sturdy. This lamp won't knock over. I might just buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: kit

customer_reviews.title: Don't listen to the trolls.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good lamp. It is sturdy, and looks great with its metallic finish . The metal shade insures a much longer life than my last crappy lamp, with a hard plastic shade.
customer_reviews.author: rodney garza

customer_reviews.title: The lamp was easy to put together and is just the right size ...
customer_reviews.text: The lamp was easy to put together and is just the right size for my computer desk. The knob for turning the light on and off is a bit stiff, so if you have arthritis or weakness in your fingers, this may not be the lamp for you. I can put this lamp where I need it so that it is out of the way of my work yet it's light is right where I need it. I use a 13 watt fluorescent bulb in the lamp and have had no problem with it becoming overheated as some reviewers have mentioned. For the price, this is a really nice lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Restfinder

customer_reviews.title: Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Real nice lamp. Arrived promptly. One screw assembly. I use a 4w appliance bulb in an adapter for a night light. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Baited by a switch!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these. Both failed from faulty switch. What a shame to trash so much material because of one defective component. The way it is built make it impossible to replace the switch without doing a lot of damage. Were this not so, I would have done the repair.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C

customer_reviews.title: SO happy and thankful and grateful for how quickly it arrived
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp for my autistic son who is obsessed with the lamp at the beginning of Pixar movies. I am so, SO happy and thankful and grateful for how quickly it arrived. It is a Christmas gift, so he has not gotten to see it yet, but he has asked for it every day for 3 months. He will be one happy boy Christmas morning! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is solid, looks great, and works as if it should cost a lot more. This lamp for this price is a super value! The bendability of it is great, offering lots of different angles. My only complaint is when you put a 60 watt bulb in the lamp top/shade gets very hot, so it is easy to burn your fingers if you grab it without thinking. But a great solid, quality, bendable lamp that you cannot beat for the price! I think it is worth twice as much as it costs.
customer_reviews.author: C. Medina

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this lamp long—maybe a week—so I can't speak for its reliability. But as far as I know, this is a five-star product. First of all, it looks great. Just surprisingly sharp for something I bought as a purely utilitarian item. Second, it does its job. Swings into place, stays put, emits light. And, finally, it just feels/looks solid. For $25 (or something like that), it's a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Although beautiful lamp stopped working 2 days after purchase! 😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bird Approved
customer_reviews.text: Task lamp came on time and was packaged well. Just as described. Looks great and seems very sturdy. I am using it for the top of a large flight cage that has two canaries and a finch. I am using a FeatherBrite 20 watt, 120v full spectrum compact bulb and that should be good for New England winters. The bulb sticks out an inch beyond the shade, the shade gets warm but not hot. Birds are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Nice swivel lamp
customer_reviews.text: Nice swivel lamp. My hubby uses it at his bedside for extra light and reading and such. Exactly as described..
customer_reviews.author: KIMMYSUE

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Though the cord is short for my application, it is a superior unit to similar 'Pixar' type lamps. It is sturdier than it appears when first un-boxed. As long as you don't need to make large or frequent adjustments it will work well for you.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: It looks exactly as it does in the photo and the finish  is a mat finish - very attractive !
customer_reviews.text: Love the style , the flexibility , and the price !
customer_reviews.author: Pat Witt

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a second one for my office which is dimly lit. The flat Philips led bulb that I purchased separately is great too. Doesn't take up too much space and doesn't get hot either. It's got a good height to it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ted M Black

customer_reviews.title: swing arm lamp has somewhat limited range
customer_reviews.text: This lamp gives good bright light, however it will not move forward and down like my old one did. I really need it to move forward and down more as I use it to light my work space and I need all the light I can get.
customer_reviews.author: kutyus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Student Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This adjustable lamp puts the light right where you need it. I see what the others reviewers mean about the stem fitting loosely into the base. It wobbles a tiny bit but not a big deal. I put a Cree 60 watt equivalent LED soft white bulb in it and after an hour the shade is not hot and the light is very pleasing and not glaring at all.
customer_reviews.author: Wafflemaker Mom

customer_reviews.title: This lamp won't keep you in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! The perfect size for my nightsand. Installed a Phillips Hue light and havent had any issues in using it.
customer_reviews.author: Minx

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected and lightning fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Great size and looks great in brushed nickel! Oh and it was delivered 3 days before Amazon said it would be here! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon K.

customer_reviews.title: It has a somewhat limited range of movement compared to ...
customer_reviews.text: It has a somewhat limited range of movement compared to some others. Probably safety/tipping concerns but the lamp seems to be solid and works well. Might buy a second unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Decent light, but wat too hot with 60 watt bulb!
customer_reviews.text: is rated for 60 watt, however the metal head that houses the bulb gets burning hot with a 60 watt bulb, which makes it hard to turn off without scorching your fingers. I bought one for each of my boys and this is an issue for both lamps. Put in a 25 watt and is fine. Cute light, decent quality outside of the wattage issue.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is what I wanted and needed but the on-off switch is very difficult to turn.
customer_reviews.author: All-access Customer

customer_reviews.title: This looks good enough on my desk
customer_reviews.text: This looks good enough on my desk, and the arms stay where I want them to unlike my previous lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: The base does look like a "glass jar" in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I used the other reviews to buy correct lightbulbs for what I wanted. It doesn't look cheap, and enhances my office, while providing the additional light I now find I need for work. The base does look like a "glass jar" in the picture, but in reality, it just looks like a normal base. I don't know why it looks that way in the pciture.
customer_reviews.author: chasmin

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Saw some questions about dimensions so here is this, it’s all in inches. Nice quality and looks great. The metal can get hot around the bulb so I would not leave it on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Karley

customer_reviews.title: Great design-on-a-dime feature to add to an office or bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Great design-on-a-dime feature to add to an office or bedroom. Give you the cool, retro factor without breaking the bank. And for those with problems with heat levels near the switch...GO GREEN...LED MANNNNNNNN!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs, well made, sturdy...
customer_reviews.text: and, yes: lights with a regular size bulb. This is a great little metal lamp - especially considering the low price! Somewhat smaller than a full size drawing table lamp, which is exactly what I needed. Heavy base, brushed 'nickel' metal finish, professional looking... Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: StephLadder

customer_reviews.title: Died after about 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these in Dec 2016; both just stopped working at exactly same time. I know it's not an expensive lamp, but I still think it should last longer than a year and half - I've bought $10 lamps at Ikea and Target that work great for YEARS. Disappointed. The manufacturers should do better.
customer_reviews.author: tiatiatia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple months ago, but didn’t need it until now. I plugged it in and it doesn’t work. Tried multiple outlets and lightbulbs and nothing changed. Too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Product Damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product came damaged. I am going to assume that it can easily be dented.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp. No problems but it does not get ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp. No problems but it does not get abused so it should last a long time. Installed a fluorescent bulb to keep heat lower on switch.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota58801

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright
customer_reviews.text: I love this light! I use it as both an aquarium light and a desk lamp and it works great! Sometimes the light does flicker a little but it’s very rare for that to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great desk lamp for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: A well made lamp, especially for the price. I put a 100 watt equivalent LED bulb in it, draws 22 watts, seems okay, very bright. .
customer_reviews.author: ChesslerBooks

customer_reviews.title: I really love the look and polish of this lamp but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look and polish of this lamp but the part that clamps the light into the base is a bit rickety - I mean I'm not going to be twisting it a lot but rickety is not something I want in a lamp.
customer_reviews.author: William Cipolli

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp. 4 stars-see write up.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lamp. Four stars because the base could be a little heavier and sturdier. Feels a little tipsy, because the weight is all to one side.
customer_reviews.author: Mr G

customer_reviews.title: Nice utilitarian lamp to make for a classy table top
customer_reviews.text: Nioce heavy duty and stylish lamp. Gives muy office desk a classy retro look. Accets my environmentally freindly bulbs. The package was nicely packed and arrived quickly. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rmart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great lamp & fits my stainless steel desk just perfect. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: It is well designed and has a great finish Looks great and serves its
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I disklike about this lamp. It is well designed and has a great finish Looks great and serves its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Gary Walford

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, stays where placed and works. Matches the other lamps and fans.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey H. Willard

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: The joints held in place with pop metal. Lamp fits too loose in base its impossible to adjust as intended. I don't know if product has changed, but the lamp shipped to me did not match the positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Sleek design perfect for my desktop! Nice stainless steel look will go with any design.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my office desk as the overhead light is a low wattage due to the fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Coldfinger  67

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reading lamp
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lamp to set on a low table by my chase lounge where I read. I measured carefully and this lamp appeared to fit the bill which it indeed did. It is very sturdy and holds it's position well.
customer_reviews.author: Tennisfantum

customer_reviews.title: Already stopped turning on/off
customer_reviews.text: Only had this lamp for 6 months and in the last few weeks the on/off switch got almost impossible to turn and now it doesn't work at all. Very disappointed in the durability and quality.
customer_reviews.author: ajm090

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was better...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and shaky. Limited movement. Base not heavy enough. Looks good but needs improvements.
customer_reviews.author: VS631

customer_reviews.title: Was fine until it broke
customer_reviews.text: Switch broke after 7 months of light use. It was an otherwise decent lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Roland P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: For the price this lamp is great. The metal is a brushed nickel and it seems to be very stable. It is so stable that I can adjust the lamp with one hand and the base doesn't move. I like it so much that I may buy another one for my other desk.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: The lamp is very nice and useful
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is very nice and useful.The switch is a little fragile,And the part that fits in the base is wobbly.The hole is too large,and the screw holding it in is too small.Other than those items mentioned,it is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Willard J. Genz

customer_reviews.title: Great for reading or brightening up a cubicle
customer_reviews.text: Use this at my desk, good for reading but I keep it on all day because it helps brighten up the drab fluorescent nastiness of an office. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is beautiful! It looks and feels expensive
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is beautiful! It looks and feels expensive. Very modern looking. I've been complimented on it several times. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Teej01

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and does what it should
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and does what it should. With a 13w compact fluorescent bulb it only gets warm, not hot to the touch. You can tell it's made from thin gauge steel, I imagine a fall from a table would mangle it.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: The perfect light and in fact not painted
customer_reviews.text: The perfect light and in fact not painted. It blends with the surroundings in the office. I will probably buy another one. For the money, highly recommended. Buy the 13 watt energy buld for 60 watts of light at 13 watts expense. Savings
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: I bought it and received one that was not working ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and received one that was not working, so I changed. The replacing one is already showing problems. I think there is a problem on the turn knob.
customer_reviews.author: Raf

customer_reviews.title: Swing arm lamp
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a nice desk lamp for my computer, just the right size. Use a CFL or LED bulb because the switch gets pretty warm. would be nice to have the on/off switch on the base.
customer_reviews.author: w

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected. Didn’t come with a bulb. It recommends a 60W bulb but I’m using a 40W one. It heats up quite a lot when turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Maliha

customer_reviews.title: Bright Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these and the brightness of the light is outstanding and you can conveniently put them anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Classy, Timeless, Practical
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, sexy, functional! Glad it has an outlet plug and USB port for multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: LuvEn1

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lamp for work. Sturdy, good quality, looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: F. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: I am a crafter and I need a good light for detail work and this lamp provides that ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a crafter and I need a good light for detail work and this lamp provides that and can be positioned in various ways. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Arlyne

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Already had one on my computer desk, ordered another for nite stand for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Brice L. Korte Sr.

customer_reviews.title: the style is excellent and it works well
customer_reviews.text: the style is excellent and it works well. The base is very sturdy to support any articulation. The rotation is a little loose but it does not move on its own. I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and has some weight to it
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality product. Very sturdy and has some weight to it. It'll get pretty hot when left on, but its metal, so it can only be expected. But it looks great, and adds a trendy, classy feel to your desk.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton W

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light:)
customer_reviews.text: One of the best desk lamps avaialble. And the price is right. It has a solid base and is easy to adjust, which is the trademark of any desk lamp worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, the lamp did not work ! 1 star is not even accurate- I would give 0 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Beth

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these for my work and we all love them. It's simple and sleek and really makes our office look modern and nice. It was exactly what we were looking for and we've had them for about 4 months with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fanning

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this lamp on his home office desk. It looks contemporary and is perfect in size. It can be repositioned for many different angles and it is very sturdy. I would like a second one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but not very durable. Replaced after about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, functional lamp. I have a 60-watt-equivalent CFL bulb in it and it throws plenty of light. The base is heavy enough to keep it planted on the desk. I think it looks a little whimsical, kind of like the Pixar lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my office, and like them very much. They look much more expensive than they are. I put Cree LED bulbs in them, so they stay cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jo MW

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but the light switch stopped working after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Xster

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these lamps. They work great. Very sturdy. Would buy a third if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Behrens

product_meta.title: Boston Harbor WK-618E-3L Swing Arm Lamp Holder for Desk Lamp, Brushed Nickel,Grey
product_meta.description: Boston Harbor Desk Lamp, Swing Arm, Adjustable, 60 W, A19 Bulb, Arbitrary Shape, Satin Nickel Lamp, 26 in Height, cULus Listed, Metal Shade. Boston Harbor Swinging Arm Desk Lamp. The desk lamp has a swinging arm to allow for lighting anywhere you need it. Lamp has a brushed nickel finish and can be adjusted up to 26'' in height. Uses one 60 watt maximum A19 bulb (sold separately).
feature_bullets: Boston Harbor swinging arm desk lamp
Uses one 60 watt maximum A19 bulb (sold separately)
